schema.description: OAuth 2 access token. Most APIs require `https://mail.google.com/` scope. Google Auth / Service Account Token can be used to obtain a valid access token.
API key can be generated in Google Developer Console in APIs & Services section. Leave blank if OAuth access token is used.
User's email address. The special value "me" can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

If this value is true, Gmail will immediately expunge a message when it is marked as deleted in IMAP. Otherwise, Gmail will wait for an update from the client before expunging messages marked as deleted.
Whether IMAP is enabled for the account.
The action that will be executed on a message when it is marked as deleted and expunged from the last visible IMAP folder.
An optional limit on the number of messages that an IMAP folder may contain. Legal values are 0, 1000, 2000, 5000 or 10000. A value of zero is interpreted to mean that there is no limit.
